data.name: Switch Juniper QFX5200-32C-AFO2 32 Port 40G/100G QSFP+/QSFP28
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The QFX5200 line provides line-rate, low-latency platforms for building large, standards-based fabrics. These switches offer flexible 10GbE, 25GbE, 50GbE, and 100GbE interfaces for server and intra-fabric connectivity. They are an optimal choice for spine-and-leaf deployments in enterprise, service provider, and cloud provider data centers, as well as for metro routing use cases.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
This switching platform supports Juniper’s SONiC operating system implementation, delivering best-of-breed hardware and routing while taking advantage of the flexibility, resiliency, and cost savings of SONiC’s open and disaggregated architecture.

Manage your QFX5200 with turnkey Juniper Apstra software, which automates the entire network lifecycle to simplify design, deployment, and operations and provides closed-loop assurance.
data.contentInfo:
Key Features

Use Case: Data Center Fabric Leaf/Spine

Port Density:

  • QFX5200-48Y: 48 x 10/25GbE SFP+/SFP28 and 6 x 40/100GbE QSFP+/QSFP28
  • QFX5200-32C/-S: 32 x 40/100GbE QSFP+/QSFP28

Throughput: Up to 3.6/6.4 Tbps (bidirectional)

SONiC: ONIE and SONiC images preinstalled on QFX5200-32C-S

Network Automation

Support for intent-based automation, Terraform, Python, Puppet, Ansible, and zero-touch provisioning (ZTP) addresses growing network complexity in Day 0 to Day 2+ operations.

Fabric Management

Juniper’s intent-based Apstra software provides full Day 0 through Day 2+ capabilities for IP/EVPN fabrics with closed-loop assurance in the data center.

data.name: Switch Juniper QFX5700
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The QFX5700 line leverages the power of a fully programmable chipset and supports advanced Layer 2, Layer 3, and EVPN-VXLAN features. The platform accommodates diverse data center, campus fabric, data center interconnect (DCI), and firewall cluster-to-fabric connection use cases. Interface speed choice for server and intra-fabric connectivity enables deployment versatility and investment protection.
data.fullDescriptionInfo: Public cloud providers and service providers looking to meet explosive growth gain support for proven, Internet-scale 400GbE IP fabrics. For enterprise customers transitioning their server farms from 10GbE to 25GbE, the QFX5700 provides a radix-native 100GbE/400GbE EVPN-VXLAN spine option with reduced power in a smaller footprint. With up to 25.6 Tbps of bidirectional throughput, the switch is optimized for spine-and-leaf deployments in enterprise, high-performance computing, service provider, and cloud data centers.
data.contentInfo:
Key Features

Use Cases: Data Center Fabric Spine, EVPN-VXLAN Fabric, Data Center Interconnect (DCI) Border, Secure DCI, Multitier Campus, Campus Fabric

Port Density:

  • 32 x 400GbE QSFP56-DD
  • 64 x 200GbE
  • 128 x 100GbE
  • 144 x 50/40/25/10GbE

Throughput: Up to 25.6 Tbps (bidirectional)
 

Junos OS Evolved Architecture

Native Linux operating system with a modular design enables individual functional components to be upgraded independently while the system remains operational. Localization of component failures can be corrected by upgrading and restarting the specific component without having to bring down the entire device. 

Network Automation

Support for intent-based automation, Terraform, Python, Puppet, Ansible, and zero-touch provisioning (ZTP) addresses growing network complexity in Day 0 to Day 2+ operations.

Fabric Management

Intent-based Juniper Apstra network automation software provides full Day 0 through Day 2+ capabilities for IP/EVPN fabrics with closed-loop assurance in the data center.
 

Campus Deployments

The Juniper Mist Wired Assurance service simplifies the deployment and management of campus fabrics while also providing valuable insights and wired network service-level experience (SLE) metrics and visibility.

data.name: Juniper CTP151 Circuit to Packet Platform
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The CTP151 Circuit to Packet Platform bridges the legacy and IP worlds for circuit-switched applications. Designed for the U.S. and Australian markets, this 1U rack-mountable chassis provides up to eight circuit emulation interfaces.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Key Features

  • Up to 8 T1/E1 interfaces
  • 150W power supply
  • Up to 8 serial interfaces
  • Web-based management system
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: SRX1600 Firewall
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The SRX1600 1 U, next-generation firewall protects enterprise campus networks and serves as a perimeter firewall in small and midsized data centers. It's power-efficient, delivers 24 Gbps firewall throughput per rack unit, and supports line-rate MACsec encryption.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Key Features

Firewall performance (max): 24 Gbps
IPS performance: 21 Gbps
VPN performance: 18 Gbps
Maximum concurrent sessions: 2 Million
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: Juniper EX4400-24X
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The EX4400-24X is a compact, scalable, 10GbE Ethernet switch ideal for enterprise campus deployments. It is an AI-driven, cloud-native switch with EVPN-VXLAN for building advanced campus fabrics, streaming telemetry, and other leading-edge technologies.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Key Features

Port density: 24 x 1/10GbaseX, 2 x 100GbE/40GbE uplinks. Common EX4400 uplink modules including 4 x 25GbE MACsec AES256, 4 x 10GbE non-MACsec, and 1 x 100GbE MACsec AES256.
Form factor: 1 RU  
Switching capacity: 1080 Gbps
Fabric: EVPN-VXLAN, Virtual Chassis
data.contentInfo: Download tài liệu

data.name: HPE ProLiant DL385 Gen11
data.shortDescriptionInfo:
Powered by the 4th Generation AMD EPYC™ 9004 Series Processors with 5nm technology that supports up to 128 cores at 400W, 1152 MB of L3 Cache, and 24 DIMMs for DDR5 memory up to 4800 MT/s.
12 DIMM channels per processor for up to 6 TB total DDR5 memory with increased memory bandwidth and performance, and lower power requirements.
Advanced data transfer rates and higher network speeds from the PCIe Gen5 serial expansion bus, with up to 2x16 PCIe Gen5 and two OCP slots.
Includes HPE Integrated Lights-Out 6 (iLO 6) server management software that enables you to securely configure, monitor, and update your HPE ProLiant Gen11 servers seamlessly from anywhere.
Supports hot-pluggable, high-availability RAID M.2 boot options.
New features including PCIe Gen5 EDSFF support and up to 8x single-wide and 4x double-wide GPU support.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Specifications

Processor

Processor typeAMD

Processor family4th Generation AMD EPYC™ Processors

Processor numberUp to 2

Processor core availableUp to 128, depending on the processor

Processor speed4.4 GHz maximum, depending on the processor

Processor cache64 MB, 128 MB, 256 MB, 384 MB or 1152 MB L3 cache, depending on processor model

Server Memory

Memory typeHPE DDR5 Smart Memory

Maximum memory6.0 TB with 256 GB DDR5

Memory slots24

Memory protection featuresECC

Server Cooling

System fan features6 fans included

Server Expansions

Expansion slots8 maximum, for detailed descriptions refer to the QuickSpecs

Server Controllers

Storage controllerHPE Tri-Mode Controllers, refer to the QuickSpecs for more detail

Server Drives

Drive supportedUp to 12 LFF SAS/SATA with 4 LFF mid drive optional, 4 LFF rear drive
Up to 24 SFF SAS/SATA/NVMe with 8 SFF mid drive optional and 2 SFF rear drive optional
Up to 36 EDSFF

Server Power

Power supply type2 Flexible Slot power supplies maximum, depending on model

Management Software

Infrastructure managementHPE iLO Standard with Intelligent Provisioning (embedded), HPE OneView Standard (requires download); HPE iLO Advanced, HPE iLO Advanced Premium Security Edition, and HPE OneView Advanced (require licenses)
Compute Ops Management Software

data.name: HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen11
data.shortDescriptionInfo:
Intuitive Cloud Operating Experience: Simple, Self-service, and Automated
HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen11 servers are engineered for your hybrid world. The new ProLiant Gen11 servers simplify the way you control your business’s compute—from edge to cloud—with a cloud operating experience.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
• Powered by 4th and 5th Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Processors that support up to 64 cores1 (128 cores per server), 350W TDP.
  • Increased memory bandwidth to 5600 MT/s2, performance and lower power requirements with up to 8 TB DDR5 memory capacity with 32 DIMM slots.
  • Advanced data transfer rates from the PCIe Gen5 serial expansion bus, support up to 10 standard PCIe Gen5 slots and 2 OCP 3.0 slots3.
  • Includes HPE Integrated Lights-Out 6 (iLO 6) server management software that enables you to securely configure, monitor, and update your HPE ProLiant Gen11 servers seamlessly from anywhere.
  • Supports hot-pluggable, high-availability, RAID1 protected M.2 NVMe boot option.
  • Supports new EDSFF E3.S NVMe form factor to enable higher-density servers and storage systems, optimization of PCIe lanes from CPUs, and ultra-high SSD performance.
data.contentInfo:
Processor

Processor typeIntel

Processor family5th Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Processors and 4th Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Processors

Processor number1 or 2

Processor core available8 to 64 cores, depending on processor.

Processor speed3.9 GHz, maximum depending on processor.

Processor cache22.5 MB L3 to 320 MB L3, depending on processor.

Server Memory

Memory typeHPE DDR5 Smart Memory

Maximum memory8.0 TB with 256 GB DDR5 DIMM

Memory slots32 DIMM slots

Memory protection featuresAdvanced ECC Memory Online Spare Mode Memory Lock Step Mode

Server Cooling

System fan featuresDepending on model, Standard 3 fans, none-hot-plug. Optional 5 additional fans, hot-plug and N+1 redundancy. Refer to the QuickSpecs for more detail.

Server Expansions

Expansion slots2 to 10 PCIe Gen5 (2 OCP 3.0). Refer to the QuickSpecs for more detail.

Server Form Factor

Form factor4U Tower

Server Controllers

Server Drives

Drive supported4 to 12 LFF SAS/SATA or 8 to 24 SFF SAS/SATA/x1 NVMe HDD/SSD, or 8 SFF x4 NVMe SSD, or 12 EDSFF x4 NVMe SSD, depending on model. Upgrade option kits are available.

Optical drive typeOptional DVD-ROM or DVD-RW. Optional Half-Height RDX, up to 1. Refer to the QuickSpecs for more detail.

Server Power

Power supply type2 Flexible Slot power supplies maximum, depending on model.

Management Software

Infrastructure managementHPE iLO Standard with Intelligent Provisioning (embedded), HPE OneView Standard (requires download); HPE iLO Advanced, and HPE OneView Advanced (require licenses) Compute Ops Management Software.

Security

SecurityUEFI Secure Boot and Secure Start support.
Intel® Software Guard Extensions (SGX) support.
Immutable Silicon Root of Trust.
TPM (Trusted Platform Module) 2.0 support.
Front bezel key-lock feature, Intrusion Cable (Optional), Padlock slot and Kensington Lock slot support.

data.name: HPE ProLiant ML110 Gen11
data.shortDescriptionInfo:
Intuitive Cloud Operating Experience: Simple, Unified, and Automated
HPE ProLiant ML110 Gen11 servers are engineered for your hybrid world. HPE ProLiant Gen11 servers simplify the way you control your business’s compute—from edge to cloud—with a cloud operating experience.
Powered by 4th and 5th Gen Intel® Xeon® Scalable Processors that support up to 32 cores, 185W TDP.
Increased memory bandwidth to 5600 MT/s1 , performance and lower power requirements with up to 1.5 TB DDR5 memory capacity with 16 DIMM slots.
Advanced data transfer rates from the PCIe Gen5 serial expansion bus, support up to 4 standard PCIe Gen5 x16 slots and 1 OCP 3.0 x16 slots.
Includes HPE Integrated Lights-Out 6 (iLO 6) server management software that enables you to securely configure, monitor, and update your HPE ProLiant Gen11 servers seamlessly from anywhere.
Supports hot-pluggable, high-availability, RAID1 protected M.2 NVMe boot option.
Embedded Intel VROC SATA/NVMe support

data.contentInfo:
Warranty

Warranty3/3/3: Server Warranty includes three years of parts, three years of labor, and three years of on-site support coverage. Additional information regarding worldwide limited warranty and technical support is available at: https://support.hpe.com/hpsc/wc/public/home. Additional HPE support and service coverage for your product can be purchased locally. For information on availability of service upgrades and the cost for these service upgrades, refer to the HPE website at https://www.hpe.com/support.

data.name: HPE Cray Storage Systems C500
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Spend Less on HPC/AI Storage and More on CPU/GPU Compute NodesHPE Cray Storage Systems C500 uses the same cost-effective open source architecture that was selected for 100% of the United States DOE exascale supercomputers.
Support growing business demand for better performance, capacity, and availability with a cost-effective management system built on HPE ProLiant DL325.
Host both metadata and storage on a 2U24 NVMe SSD storage controller for better data consistency.
Customize configurations as small as 12 NVMe SSDs with the ability to partially populate system enclosures.
Achieve supercomputing-class parallel storage with fewer in just three rack units.
With just three rack units, achieve impressive out-of-the-box performance with up to 80 GB/sec read and 60 GB/sec write throughput.
Simplify integration into your organization's global data platform with NFS gateway functionality.
data.contentInfo: Download

Mono-socket x86 server providing an ideal mix of performance and cost in a compact 1U space

Designed for standard small & medium business workloads: infrastructure (file, print, web), collaborative (email), or industry applications

data.fullDescriptionInfo: Tech Specs

data.name: mTera Series
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Peace of Mind for Metro and Regional Networks

The Infinera mTera Universal Transport Platform is an extremely flexible and efficient network transport solution supporting scalable grooming and an innovative protocol-agnostic switch fabric in which each and every port on virtually every card can be software-configured between OTN and Ethernet. With feature-rich Carrier Ethernet and MPLS-TP and native SONET/SDH grooming, network operators can rest easy that the mTera can rapidly adapt to any network challenge.
data.contentInfo:
Achieve unparalleled network efficiency

Reduce 100G+ interface costs with efficient native grooming of OTN, packet, and SONET/SDH onto the same high-speed wavelengths.

Power new revenue-generating services

Deliver new and differentiated services (OTN, Ethernet, storage, legacy) to a wider addressable market without forklifts.

Take advantage of open automation

Automate all your networking tasks with open interfaces for easy integration with software applications and tools.

Leverage the ultimate network modernization tool

Migrate SONET/SDH to next-generation packet-optical technologies, including MPLS-TP, Carrier Ethernet, and OTN with STS-1/VC-4 switching granularity.

data.name: 7090 Series - Packet Transport Platforms
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The Infinera 7090 Packet Transport Platforms provide both Multiprotocol Label Switching–Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) and Carrier Ethernet-based options, addressing applications including business Ethernet services, migration from TDM to packet, and residential and mobile backhaul.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Scalable Carrier Ethernet and MPLS-TP

Support applications from the very edge to the metro core with solutions from 3 Gb/s NIDs to 960 Gb/s chassis.

High-quality synchronization

Includes Synchronous Ethernet, 1588v2 boundary clock, and hybrid options, enabling high-quality mobile backhaul and TDM migration services.

TDM migration

Protect high-margin TDM service revenues while migrating to a next-generation packet-based network

MEF CE 2.0-certified

Simplifies the launch of new revenue-generating E-Line, E-LAN, E-Tree, and E-Access Ethernet services with a fully MEF-certified solution.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: GX Series Compact Modular Platform
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The GX Series is the industry’s most flexible open compact modular solution, with support for transponder, switchponder, and OLS in a single platform. With 300-mm and 600-mm chassis, it can be optimized for virtually any application, from DCI and metro to long-haul and subsea. With seamless support for multiple generations of optical engine, from 200G through 2.4 Tb/s (2 x 1.2 Tb/s per wavelength), as well as game-changing Super C and Super L functionality, the GX solution provides industry-leading economics and unmatched network scalability with up to 100 Tb/s of capacity per fiber.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Leading configuration flexibility

Modular sled-based architecture with both transponder and integrated optical line system capabilities. Reduces CapEx and OpEx while providing investment protection with a single platform that be easily evolved to support virtually any network application from edge to core.
 

Drive down cost and power per bit

Provides continuous cost and power per bit savings and increased network capacity with a pay-as-you-grow model with support for seamless integration of multiple generations of coherent optical engines – including Infinera’s industry leading 1.2 Tb/s ICE7.
 

Industry-leading fiber capacity

Leveraging the latest optical line system technology, the GX OLS provides transmission capabilities across the entire Super C- and Super L-bands. The result is a solution that provides >25% more capacity per fiber than traditional extended C-based solution without compromising performance.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: XTM Series Packet Optical Transport Platform
data.shortDescriptionInfo: The XTM Series is a low-power, high-density, and efficient metro packet optical transport platform optimized for the latest generation of network services, including 5G, DAA, and high-speed business services. It provides a solution with the lowest total cost of ownership (TCO) to power new revenue-generating services.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Leading density

Offers unparalleled density and scalability for multi-service metro access and aggregation networks, including integrated Layer 1 and Layer 2 support.
 

Superior performance for LTE-A and 5G

Delivers precision timing and synchronization with low latency that far exceeds LTE-A and 5G requirements for superior, differentiated performance.
 

Lower TCO

Benefit from exceptionally low operating costs with best-in-class low power consumption and efficient traffic management combined with a simple, modular, scalable architecture.
 

Multi-customer hosting

Ideal for mobile wholesale operators thanks to multi-service 4G/5G synchronization domain support within the same chassis.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: 7100 Series Packet-Optical Transport Solutions
data.shortDescriptionInfo: Infinera 7100 Series Packet-Optical Transport Solutions are right-sized and support a flexible mix of transponders, muxponders, packet switching, OTN switching, SONET/SDH switching, and ROADM-based optical line system, providing compact, flexible, and future-proof solutions for metro networks.
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
Unparalleled flexibility

Select from multi-protocol fabricless switching, transparent 10G/100G, ODU payload encryption, ROADM-on-a-blade, and the innovative Pluggable Optical Layer.

Edge to core

Choose from compact 1RU, 2RU, and 5RU chassis and service from 100M to 100G to efficiently support a broad range of customer requirements and network applications.

Efficient Ethernet solution

Seamlessly scalable and efficient solution supports 200G of Layer 2 switching on a blade and up to 1.2T of any-to-any Layer 2 switching on a shelf, with a robust set of Ethernet features.
 

Modernize your network

Supports SONET/SDH, Ethernet, and OTN switching on a single chassis, providing the ideal tool for network modernization.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: Tait TB9400 Base Station/Repeater
data.fullDescriptionInfo: The Tait TB9400 "High level" base station is a multi-mode platform for analog conventional, MPT, DMR and P25 systems. It provides both digital frequency and time division multiple access for FDMA and TDMA operation.s.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: Tait TB9300 Base Station / Repeater
data.fullDescriptionInfo: The Tait TB9300 is an IP connected, digital base station for DMR Tier 2 (conventional) or Tier 3 (trunked) networks. Their functionality allows for flexible network designs and easy migration paths from analog networks to DMR. These spectrally efficient base stations provide a 6.25kHz equivalent operation using two TDMA channels in one 12.5kHz channel, giving you greater capacity now and providing a future path for expansion.
data.contentInfo: Download

data.name: Máy chủ HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen10
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
1 x Intel Xeon Silver 4210

Intel Xeon Scalable, 1st & 2nd generations

1 x HPE 16GB (1x16GB) Single Rank x4 DDR4-2933

24 x DIMM, Max 3TB

8 x 2.5" Hot Plug

1 x HPE 500W Flex Slot Platinum Hot Plug
data.contentInfo:
Máy chủ HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen10 cung cấp một máy chủ tháp dual-socket bảo mật với hiệu suất, khả năng mở rộng và độ tin cậy đã được chứng minh. 

- HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen10 sử dụng bộ vi xử lý Intel® Xeon® Scalable với hiệu suất lên tới 71% 1 và tăng 27% lõi 2 , cùng với bộ nhớ DDRE SmartMemory hỗ trợ lên đến 3.0 TB và 11% 3nhanh hơn 2400 MT / s. 

- Khung gầm có thể đặt lại được thiết kế lại ngắn hơn với nhiều tùy chọn nâng cấp cung cấp tính linh hoạt có thể mở rộng khi nhu cầu kinh doanh của bạn phát triển.

- Nó hỗ trợ 12 Gb / s SAS, NVMe SSD, nhúng 4x1GbE NIC với một loạt các đồ họa và tùy chọn tính toán. 

- Được hỗ trợ bởi tổ chức dịch vụ hàng đầu của HPE Pointnext, máy chủ HPE ProLiant ML350 Gen10 giúp bạn chuyển đổi sang một doanh nghiệp kỹ thuật số với sự nhanh nhẹn hơn và tất cả trong ngân sách CNTT hạn chế của bạn.

data.name: Máy chủ Dell PowerEdge R740
data.shortDescriptionInfo: đâs
data.fullDescriptionInfo:
CPU Sockets: 2 x Socket P (LGA 3647)

CPU Support: 2nd Generation Intel Xeon Scalable processors, up to 28 cores per processor

RAM Support: 24 x DDR4 DIMM slots, Supports RDIMM /LRDIMM, 2933MT/s, 3TB max. Up to 12 x NVDIMM, 192 GB Max

RAID Controller: H730P
data.contentInfo:
Máy chủ Dell EMC PowerEdge R740 là một phần trong danh mục máy chủ thế hệ thứ 14 của Dell EMC, cung cấp hiệu suất ứng dụng nâng cao, dung lượng lưu trữ lớn và nhiều tiềm năng mở rộng. Với thiết kế gồm các tính năng bảo mật tích hợp, Dell PowerEdge R740 là một trong những dòng máy chủ được lựa chọn nhiều nhất hiện nay. PowerEdge R740 là một kiến trúc hoàn toàn mới với nhiều tùy chọn lưu trữ hơn, tăng cường bảo mật hệ thống và cải tiến triệt để trong hệ quản trị máy chủ, giúp quản trị viên dễ dàng quản lý, nắm bắt mối đe dọa nguy hiểm đến các ứng dụng quan trọng của mình.

Hiệu suất cơ sở dữ liệu tốt hơn gấp mười lần với sự hỗ trợ cho NVDIMM và chipset mới của Intel cung cấp thêm 27% lõi hơn so với người tiền nhiệm của nó. 03 GPU dạng double-wide hoặc 06 GPU single có thể được thêm vào hệ thống này để tăng cường triển khai VDI và hỗ trợ tới 50% người dùng nhiều hơn R730 của Dell.

Được thiết kế để hỗ trợ một loạt các ứng dụng kinh doanh bao gồm VDI và phần mềm được lưu trữ định nghĩa, Dell R740 cho phép bạn trộn và kết hợp bất kỳ loại ổ đĩa nào trong khung của nó. Với sự hỗ trợ cho HDD, SSD, SSD NVMe được tối ưu hóa khởi động và lên đến 24 ổ SSD NVMe, cho phép các doanh nghiệp điều chỉnh lưu trữ phù hợp theo mọi yêu cầu về năng lực và hiệu suất của mình.

Hiệu suất

Được trang bị chipset C620 mới của Intel, Quản trị viên có thể cài đặt một hoặc hai bộ vi xử lý Intel Xeon Scalable với tối đa 28 lõi mỗi bộ xử lý. Với Advanced Vector Extension 512 (AVX-512) của Intel, một tập hợp các hướng dẫn mới với các vectơ 512 bit, gấp đôi số lượng thanh ghi được cung cấp so với công nghệ AVX2 của Intel. Hơn nữa, các công nghệ bảo mật dựa trên phần cứng được tích hợp vào silicon của Intel để bảo vệ dữ liệu và các hoạt động của hệ thống.

Bộ nhớ

Hệ thống này cung cấp hỗ trợ cho các mô-đun bộ nhớ LRDIMM hoặc RDIMM với tối đa 24 khe DDR4 DIMM hoạt động trong hai cấu hình bộ vi xử lý. Với bộ vi xử lý kép, lên đến 12 x 16GB, NVDIMM thứ hạng đơn có thể được cài đặt và ghép nối với các mô-đun bộ nhớ RDIMM 12 x 32GB. Các mô-đun LRDIMM không tương thích với các mô-đun bộ nhớ NVDIMM. Tốc độ lên đến 2933 MT/s được hỗ trợ trên Dell R740, nhưng khả năng này phụ thuộc vào kiểu bộ xử lý, loại bộ nhớ và cấu hình bộ nhớ. Một bộ nhớ tối đa của 3TB được cung cấp khi sử dụng các mô-đun bộ nhớ LRDIMM 128 GB trong tất cả 24 khe DIMM.
